bioghist.p: William S. Helverson was undertaker and embalmer with a business at 1518 North Twelfth Street.

scopecontent.p: The collection contains financial and burial records related to the operation of an undertaking business. Burial records include information on the deceased and the funeral and burial arrangements, including costs for items such as coffins, carriages, grave digging, hearses, and nurserymen. Some records indicate the cemetery and plot number, as well as the cause of death, age at death, and whether the deceased served in the military. Burials are in Union Harmony Cemetery, Strangers Ground, Hanover Burial Ground, and other cemeteries. Financial records include cash books, listings of credits and debits, and carriage hire records.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
